name: Cold Vengeance (Demo)
description:
This is an early demo build of Cold Vengeance. Contains a demo level which will not be in the final game. As this is an early build, the game still unpolished and may contain bugs.

Cold Vengeance is a 3D Low-Poly run'n'gun game.

In the year 200X, a totalitarian regime came into power in Canada. After forming. They kidnapped the president, bombed most major American cities, and then sent in an army of soldiers and robots to finish the job. To make matters worse, they've also formed an alliance with the mysterious Ninja Empire.

You play Sgt. Jon Dagger, a lone American soldier with the consciousness deceased Soviet engineer living inside his brain. 40 Years ago, he fought the Soviet menace on Venus. Now he must run 'n' gun his way across the ruins of America all the way up to the frozen wastelands of Canada in his quest for Cold Vengeance.

Design, Coding, Modeling and Music - Alec Stamos - http://renegadesector.com/

Concept Art - Ben Evans - http://benkevans.tumblr.com/

If you enjoy the demo, please vote for Cold Vengeance on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
